item.title: License
item.description: Unless otherwise noted, content of this website is (c) 2024 Juan Cerde単o. The code for this website is licensed under the MIT License and is hosted on Github/@ajuancer/ajuancer.github.io. The website is stylized with the simple Simple theme package, which is also licensed under the MIT License and available in the Github/@ajuancer/juancer.me. This web uses a custom version of the Inter font by Ramsus Andersson and the Inter Project Authors, and it is licensed under the SIL Open Font License 1.

item.title: Repositories list
item.description: Repositories list This list can be outdated. It does not include contributions made to repositories owned by other users or contributions of repositories outside GitHub.
